quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
author: Norman Vaughan

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

quote: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Limit your 'always' and your 'nevers'.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: Light tomorrow with today.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Not in doing what you like, but in liking what you do is the secret of happiness.
author: J.M. Barrie

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
author: Unknown

quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Unknown

quote: Little things make big days.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
author: Unknown

quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
author: Unknown

quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
author: Unknown

quote: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
author: Gary Player

quote: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
author: Unknown

quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
author: Unknown

quote: Do something every day that brings you closer to your goals.
author: Unknown

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Work hard in silence, let success be your noise.
author: Frank Ocean

quote: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
author: Jerry Dunn

quote: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
author: Unknown

quote: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
author: Unknown

quote: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
author: Unknown

quote: Great things take time.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Failure is not the opposite of success; it’s part of success.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
author: Unknown

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

quote: Hustle in silence and let your success make the noise.
author: Unknown

quote: Your only limit is your mind.
author: Unknown

quote: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
author: Unknown

quote: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
author: Unknown

quote: Be stronger than your excuses.
author: Unknown

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote: Big journeys begin with small steps.
author: Unknown

quote: Make today so awesome that yesterday gets jealous.
author: Unknown

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
author: Unknown

quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
author: Christian D. Larson

quote: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: The man who has confidence in himself gains the confidence of others.
author: Hasidic Proverb

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
author: Tim Notke

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Do what is right, not what is easy.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Live each day as if your life had just begun.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Don’t wait for inspiration. It comes while working.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The way to succeed is to double your failure rate.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Don’t be afraid to stand for what you believe in, even if that means standing alone.
author: Unknown

quote: Your passion is waiting for your courage to catch up.
author: Isabelle Lafleche

quote: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs
